alert.note: Alert for Posey; Vanderburgh (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 09 at 11:02AM EST until February 12 at 4:45PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...Kentucky... Ohio River at Mount Vernon. .Recent precipitation caused the Ohio River to rise. At Mount Vernon, the river is forecast to crest in minor flood at 36.8 feet Thursday evening, not falling below flood stage until late Saturday morning. For the Ohio River...including Mount Vernon...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Mount Vernon. * WHEN...Until Saturday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 36.8 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage late Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 35.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
